summary: A new mountainous village which has it's own problems and quarrels.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=4]
I am currently working on a revision of the mod. If anyone has suggestions, let me know.
The buildable player home will be gone, and there will be a practice area for the guards.[/size][/b][/center]

This mod adds a new village, near Markarth. The people from the village almost never leave, and the other people in Skyrim do not know of it's existence. 
Not much is known about the origins of the village, but clues are there that the Dwemer had something to do with it. 

[b][i]I have tried a lot, but I can't get it to work without the Hearthfires-DLC... 
Therefore, a new patch may not come very soon. (and because I will be focussing more on the Tolkien-Theme)[/i][/b]

The shops in the village have unusual opening-times if you got used to the every-day shops of Skyrim. Shop-owners almost never work every day of the week. The village is rich enough to afford it. 
[img]https://fbcdn-sphotos-h-a.akamaihd.net/hphotos-ak-xfp1/t31.0-8/906413_1066058416822946_5867333514862226089_o.jpg[/img]
[b][size=4]Finding the village:[/size][/b]
As soon as you install the mod, you will get a map marker showing the - mostly unused - entrance to the village.

[size=4][b]The mod adds:[/b][/size]
A new village, with 5 vendors, a jail and a longhouse. 
1 playerhome that is already there
1 playerhome you can built yourself
I did not like the eventual design, and so stopped to put in a lot of effort. I even left the chest with building-materials, so you don't have to run all
around Skyrim to gather the resources. I did however choose to not delete it (yet). In a new version, I will delete all the hearthfire-content and
add some traininggrounds where the hearthfires house now is.
2 secret area's
1 complete set of armour and from every weapon one item. (all re-textured and available through quests)
1 new type of ore
8 quests

[size=4][b]Be sure to also check out the website I made for this mod![/b][/size]
[size=4][b][url=http://vdhorses.wix.com/aldanhiir]http://vdhorses.wix.com/aldanhiir[/url]

Request:[/b][/size]
If someone wants to voice-act one of the characters, knows a new quest that would fit into the town or wants to have a go at furnishing the hearthfires house, feel free to let me know!

[size=4][b]Skyrim mods top 5 of the week[/b][/size]:
For those that watch Skyrim Mods top 5 of the Week, one of the secret rooms is based on that show. I can give you one hint: Longhouse.
The rest may check it out too, of course. Search well for the entrance! Once you see the room, you will know you are there. Undoubtedly.

This is my first serious mod, so any hits, tips or help would be really appreciated.

[size=4][b]To Do list:[/b][/size]
Delete the hearthfires content and create a training-area.
Create a custom enchantment for the weapons and armour.
Add some more quests, and perhaps more dungeons.
Expand the lore of the mod quite significantly.
Give the player the choice of speaking Dovahzul with the dragons.
Some more things...

[size=4][b]UPDATE 1.01:[/b][/size]
[size=2]-The entrance of Aldanhiir is now accessible by followers.
-[/size]Adds some extras to the Skryim Mods top 5 of the Week content.
-Adds the custom textured shield. It is not available through quest, but from a chest.
-Makes the spell you get from the main-quest useful during the rest of the game.
author: ErianDragonborn
